#!/bin/bash
/System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Resources/kickstart -allowAccessFor -specifiedUsers -configure -users hccadmin -access -on -privs -all -clientopts -setvnclegacy -vnclegacy yes -setvncpw -vncpw hccadmin
sleep 2
/System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Resources/kickstart -activate -configure -users hccadmin -privs -all
sleep 2
/System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Resources/kickstart -restart -menu -clientopts -setmenuextra -menuextra no
sleep 2
echo "Enabling ssh for admins" systemsetup -setremotelogin on dseditgroup -o create -q com.apple.access_ssh dseditgroup -o edit -a admin -t group com.apple.access_ssh exit 0
